results.content: When the title of something is Step-by-Step I expected an explanation of what we were doing. This is basically a way to sell a generic Drupal 7 to Wordpress Migration script. Although you can get it for free on GitHub. This course is great if you don't want to be taught how to write scripts or interact with the database correctly. If you just want to learn how to download a script and run it, then it's the course for you. I hope Liran (the instructor) comes back and creates a course that gives you the tools to learn how to do it yourself.

results.content: I think this course is really helpful for the task at hand; I think a few things could be explained a little more thoroughly for those who aren't experts as I got lost a little bit.

results.content:
No support for images, taxonomy, users, etc.
No support for custom content types.
A waste of time and money.

results.content: I think this mostly was easy to understand, some parts of the course could need some more details, how to write database and those parts.  Had some problem with the script but the instructor was very helpful. And I managed to migrate my site!

results.content: This was perfect. Exactly what I needed and not difficult at all. All my Drupal content (100's of article and pages) migrated to Wordpress very quickly and easily. Thanks so much for this!
